resources.string: This screen steps you through granting the permissions needed by this app.

Usage access is required to see your actual mobile data usage. First, click the "Grant permission" button to open the system Usage access screen. You\'ll see NUD listed, and maybe some other apps like Google Play Services.
Next, click on NUD to open the screen shown below, and click the switch to enable usage access.
Finally, keep clicking back until you return to this screen.
Permission to \"make and manage phone calls\" is required to see your mobile data usage. This app will never actually make phone calls.
Chart showing your current data usage
Don\'t have permission to read data usage. Click to fix
The next two screens will step you through granting permission to read your mobile usage data.\n\nTap the right arrow to begin.

This app requires permissions to work properly. The next two screens will step you through granting the required permissions.

The first permission is "make and manage phone calls". The app doesn't actually make phone calls, but this permission is required to identify mobile data usage separately from wifi usage.

The second permission is "Usage access". This permission is needed to actually read the mobile data usage counter.
If you continue without granting permission the app won\'t be able to display your mobile data usage.
Don\'t have permission to read data usage
You\'ve denied permission to read data usage
You\'ve denied \"Make and Manage phone calls\" permission and ticked \"Don\'t ask again\". You must now use the app info screen to grant permissions.
